messages.message: I created a new sandbox to bypass whatever issue is in my old one and i got it working but no frontend changes are being applied and even changes already merged to master are not appearing? I enabled webpack already too: https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/udit-dev-2?cw=dev
hm did a workspace update and now running into this issue with nginx `Error from server (NotFound): configmaps "nginx-conf-tmpl" not found`

can you check your `/usr/local/etc/kubeconfig`? it should look like this
```clusters:
- cluster:
    server: http://crafting-aihub.k8s.g.sandbox
  name: crafting-aihub
contexts:
- context:
    cluster: crafting-aihub
    namespace: intes-use2-crafting-aihub-instabase
    user: ""
  name: crafting-aihub
current-context: crafting-aihub
kind: Config```

mine is only:

```clusters:
- cluster:
    server: http://crafting-aihub.k8s.g.sandbox
    name: crafting-aihub
contexts:
- name: crafting-aihub
  cluster: crafting-aihub```

but in the new sandbox its this:

```clusters:
- cluster:
    server: http://crafting-aihub.k8s.g.sandbox
  name: ""
- cluster:
    server: http://crafting-aihub.k8s.g.sandbox
  name: crafting-aihub
contexts:
- context:
    cluster: ""
    namespace: ""
    user: ""
  name: crafting-aihub
current-context: crafting-aihub
kind: ""```

ah yes, I forgot Matt configured that in the base image a couple months back with https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/63356/files -- if you can update to the snippet I pasted it should work, I'll look into fixing this in the base image configs
Yes, it works now and see the local frontend changes, thank you! @sean.donohoe
